title: A Dynamical Approach to Gauge Fixing
abstract: We study gauge fixing in the generalized Gupta-Bleuler quantization. In this method physical states are defined to be simultaneous null eigenstates of a set of quantum invariants. We apply the method to a solvable model proposed by Friedberg, Lee, Pang and Ren and show that no Gribov-type copies appears by construction.
